pli-tv-kd13:21.1.2: dvīhappaṭicchannāyo → dvīhapaṭicchannāyo (bj, s1-3); dvīhapaṭicchannā (pts1); dvīhappaṭicchannā (mr evaṃ yāvadasāhappaṭicchannā)
pli-tv-kd13:24.1.15: itarampi māsaṃ parivāsaṃ → itarampi māsaparivāsaṃ (bj, s1-3, mr)
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.61: itarampi māsaṃ parivāsassa → itarampi māsaparivāsassa (bj, mr); itarassapi māsaparivāsassa (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd13:24.3.65: itarampi māsaṃ parivāso → itarampi māsaparivāso (bj, mr); itaropi māsaparivāso (s1-3)
pli-tv-kd13:36.1.1: Idaṃ navakaṃ porāṇapotthakesu avisuddhivaseneva āgataṃ, vuccamānatatiyanavakena ca saṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ paṭivisodhakehi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ katvā visuṃ patiṭṭhāpitaṃ. sī , syā1-3 potthakesu pana taṃ visuddhivaseneva āgataṃ. Taṃ panevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.37: āpattīhi → ayaṃ paṭhamavāro bj, s1-3 potthakesu paripuṇṇo
pli-tv-kd13:36.3.96: āpattīhi → imepi cattāro vārā bj, s1-3 potthakesu paripuṇṇā
pli-tv-kd13:37.1.16: Mūlā aṭṭhārasa visuddhato → mūlāyapaṭivisuddhako (bj); mūlaṭṭhārasa Visuddhito (s1-3); mūlā pannarasa visuddhato (pts1); mūlā pannarasa Visuddhato (mr)
